text:
@AmyMcGrathKY @JoannaCocoGrove Trump: "I Could Stand In the Middle Of Fifth Avenue And Shoot Somebody And I Wouldn't Lose Any Voters"
What if it would 20 million die or more from coronavirus... would that be sufficient or do you want more
